title: Recuro Care
description:
Recuro's virtual health platform consists of a curated suite of digital solutions-- from primary care and behavioral health to at-home testing and genetic screening. These solutions are fully customizable to the needs of any population, allowing patients to receive more personalized care and monitor their own health, no matter their location or circumstance.



VIRTUAL CARE

Our integrated team of top primary care and behavioral health physicians provides unbiased, confidential care through message-based and video interactions. We also provide health screenings and assessments in order to proactively manage specific issues and risks.


AT-HOME LABS

We make the at-home testing experience convenient and accessible with easy-to-use tests for over 90 diseases. Patients can self-collect samples in a safe home environment with rapid results available, enabling quick and early identification of diseases and timely and effective interventions.


GENOMICS

Our DNA testing platform identifies and predicts specific health issues and conditions in order to develop highly personalized treatment plans, prioritize early interventions, and effectively risk-stratify populations.
